entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:05 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Blowing snow early this morning. Local blowing snow. Local amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:36 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:36 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:36 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
